title: Organelles in living plant cells
brief_description: Shows the appearance and behaviour of all organelles that can be resolved by the phase and dark-field microscope, such as nuclei, chloroplasts, golgi bodies and kinoplasm. Discloses the interactions between the organelles and cytoplasmic network. Suitable for upper secondary level.
